wolf.dungeon.name: dungeon wolf
wolf.dungeon.description: Prey runs barely thick enough in the strange dungeon ecosystem to support a pack of these hungry predators. Any meat they can find is a meal. Dungeon wolves are heavy beasts with bone-crushing teeth.

horseshoe.name: horseshoe crab
horseshoe.description: This scuttling thing the size of a small dog bears the weight of prehistoric ancestry on its form. /Limulus transarcana/ feed on distortions of reality, but unlike their larger brethren, they cannot tear such rifts open themselves.
horseshoe.corpseMessage: The meat is succulent beneath the thick shell.

rat.large.name: large rat
rat.large.description: Matted brown fur, tattered ears, and standing as high as your knee. This hungry beast has turned from peaceful scavenging to blood-thirsty predation, and chitters as it stalks the halls and caves.

rat.giant.name: giant rat
rat.giant.description: Hissing and snarling, the shape of this feral creature belies its role as an opportunistic predator. Its size could easily bowl a man over.

noctupanther.name: noctupanther
noctupanther.description: Native to underground forests, this six-legged beast is a stalking predator. Its shape allows it to move low and silent, but it is repelled by loud noise.

animal.bat.name: giant bat
animal.bat.description: While not truly blind, these airborne predators fly erratically nonetheless, swooping in to bite pieces of their prey before retreating to distance.
animal.bat.corpseMessage: Tastes like chicken!  The world spins...

animal.spider.hunting.name: hunting spider
animal.spider.hunting.description: This skittering beast, the size of a turkey, is plated with a shiny gray exoskeleton. It hunts down its prey instead of spinning webs.
animal.spider.hunting.corpseMessage: You open it like a crab.

jelly.cube.gelatinous.name: gelatinous cube
jelly.cube.gelatinous.description: Dragging its way through corridors and halls with a 'schlorp', this cube of paralyzing jelly sucks organics from the nooks and crannies of the dungeon. They prefer carrion and nonliving food to live prey, but won't hesitate to pursue something moving if it's close enough.

jelly.slime.gray.name: gray slime
jelly.slime.gray.description: What might seem at first sight to be a puddle of liquid on the ground is actually more sinister. This is a kind of living ooze, an acidic slime that seeps across the floor and puddles after living prey.
